answerText: Miss Lonelyhearts[10] Miss Lonelyhearts was created by this author of The Day of the Locust.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 3 | 5 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character is shot by Mr. Doyle in the last pages of the novel in which he appears. [10] Name this newspaper advice columnist who feels religiously troubled by the desperate New Yorkers that he writes about.
